item.title: Windows Tips
item.description: Configuration Color management -> Advanced -> Display calibration -> Calibrate display. Change display settings -> Scale and layout -> Change the size of text, apps, and other items -> 200%. Right click on the taskbar -> Cortana -> Hidden. Right click on the taskbar -> Show People Button -> uncheck. Your account picture and profile settings -> Create your picture -> Browser for one -> Choose your avatar. Usage Remember to run GeForce Experience to update drivers from time to time.
